Notes. The following systems had insufficient data constraints for an ionization analysis: J0226+0015_268_22, J0935+0204_15_28, J0943+0531_216_61, J0943+0531_227_19, J1133+0327_164_21, J1157-0022_230_7, J1342-0053_77_10, J1437+5045_317_38, J1445+3428_232_33, J1550+4001_97_33, J1617+0638_253_39, J1619+3342_113_40, J2257+1340_270_40.
The $\mathrm{log}{N}_{{\rm{H}}{\rm{I}}},\mathrm{log}{n}_{{\rm{H}}}$ and [Z/H] values represent the 68% c.l. interval and median of the MCMC PDFs.
^a Number of positive detections constraining the model.
^b Flag indicating ${N}_{{\rm{H}}{\rm{I}}}$ treatment: 0 = Gaussian; -3 = Uniform.
